room_title: Escape room "Royal Flush Casino" by Quandary Escape Games in Providence
room_description:
You and a group of friends decide to check out a new underground casino that operates in the city. Hidden in a dark alley, behind an old dumpster you find the entrance way you were told about. You eagerly make your way into the casino and immediately fall in love with the atmosphere. The lights are low and the stakes are high... and about to get even higher.
You weren't told this was a private invitation-only casino and outsiders were absolutely not welcome. As soon as you are noticed everyone in the casino runs out the door fearing you to be cops sent in to raid their illegal operation.Disappointed, you decide to leave only to find the doors have been locked from the outside. The owners will be here in an hour. Your luck may have run out!
